subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: John Madden and Sergei Brylin scored 1 minute 10 seconds apart during the Devils’ three-goal second period, and New Jersey took advantage of the backup goalie Thomas Greiss to beat the San Jose Sharks, 3-2, at Prudential Center in Newark on Wednesday night.
